mapper.insert: insert into notification (id, type, reference_id, content, from_user_id, to_user_id, be_read, created_at) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{referenceId}, #{content}, #{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{beRead}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select n.id nid, n.type, n.summary, n.content, n.reference_id, n.from_user_id, n.to_user_id, n.be_read, n.created_at, u.id, u.nickname, u.avatar_url, u.gender from notification n join user u on n.from_user_id = u.id where to_user_id = #{userId} and n.deleted = 0 order by n.id desc
select count(1) from notification where to_user_id = #{userId} and be_read = 0 and deleted = 0
